abstract: Édgar Milciades Benítez Santander (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈeðɣar βeˈnites], born 8 November 1987), nicknamed Pájaro (bird) is a Paraguayan football forward. He currently plays for Toluca in the Liga MX.
